parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[false]] if the game window lost focus, due to user Alt+Tab-ing for example.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  [[isGameFocused]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (![[isGameFocused]]) [[then]] { [[endMission]] "End" };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isGamePaused]], [[isUIContext]], [[canSuspend]], [[isRemoteExecuted]], [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]], [[serverCommand]]
</value></part></template></root>
